thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Affordable, Close to SFO and Clean, what more do you need?
thread.title_full: Affordable, Close to SFO and Clean, what more do you need? - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: subisswaeirae
title: Affordable, Close to SFO and Clean, what more do you need?
text:
We had a flight landing at SFO at 1 AM, and we just needed a place to sleep for a few hours. The chocolate chip cookies at check in were good, the room was extremely clean and the beds were surprisingly comfortable. My only gripe was that the tub drain would not go down.
Skip the Westin, Hyatt and Marriott and avoid paying $200 extra plus parking. Stay here and park for free. You don't need to go elsewhere.
The Millbrae Pancake House is just around the corner too. Their breakfast is incredible!
